0112.name: CORE_TIMEOUT
0112.message:
Unable to connect to the server.
Please try again later
0112.long_description: Your connection to either the authentication or secure server for the friends service has timed out.
0112.short_solution:
Verify your wifi is working. If it is
working, then this is a serverside error.
Please wait and try again later.
0112.long_solution:
Check your wifi and try again later. Also refer to Nintendo's official support page https://en-americas-support.nintendo.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/14458/~/error-code%3A-001-0112

If the error persists, it may be an issue with the server. Check the server status or report the issue.
